db:article.db:para: This page covers the availability of Qt Multimedia features on iOS.

db:section.db:title: Limitations
db:section.db:para: Since Qt Multimedia for iOS uses the camera, the Info.plist assigned to QMAKE_INFO_PLIST in the project file must contain the key NSCameraUsageDescription. Otherwise the application will abort on startup. See Info.plist documentation from Apple for more information regarding this key.
